company_context: EcoTech Solutions is a mid‑size SaaS provider for renewable‑energy asset management. The GreenPulse Customer Success Team (15 members) sits in the Customer Success department and reports to the Director of Customer Success. The weekly newsletter keeps the CS team, product managers, support, and sales leadership aligned on wins, upcoming releases, and key metrics.
meeting_event_details: Monday, November 25, 2025, 09:00 – 09:30 AM PST, virtual meeting on Zoom (Meeting ID: 842 931 274). The meeting is used to confirm the editorial calendar for the upcoming newsletter and to capture any last‑minute items.

stakeholders.name: Emily Chen
stakeholders.responsibility: Drafts all newsletter copy, assembles graphics, and builds the Google Doc draft.

stakeholders.name: Raj Patel
stakeholders.responsibility: Reviews draft for accuracy, relevance, and tone; provides feedback by Wednesday 10:00 AM PST.

stakeholders.name: Lena Morales
stakeholders.responsibility: Approves final version; gives sign‑off no later than Thursday 12:00 PM PST.

stakeholders.name: Mia Torres
stakeholders.responsibility: Ensures brand‑compliant visuals and alt‑text; delivers assets by Wednesday 09:00 AM PST.

stakeholders.name: Javier Gomez
stakeholders.responsibility: Sets up UTM parameters and post‑send tracking; validates tracking code by Thursday 02:00 PM PST.

deliverables: Draft newsletter in Google Docs (Word count ≤ 800, includes sections: Wins & Highlights, Upcoming Feature Releases, Customer Spotlight, Metrics Snapshot).
Final HTML email built in Mailchimp using the approved EcoTech brand template.
Analytics tracking sheet with UTM parameters and KPI baseline.
success_criteria: Newsletter sent to the CS distribution list by Friday, November 29, 2025, 09:00 AM PST.
Open rate ≥ 45% and click‑through rate ≥ 12% measured 48 hours after send.
Zero GDPR or accessibility compliance issues (all images have alt‑text, unsubscribe link present).
Positive feedback from ≥ 80% of recipients in the post‑send survey (rating 4/5 or higher).
All stakeholder approvals completed on time (no later than Thursday 12:00 PM PST).
constraints: Planning horizon is T‑7: all content must be finalized within 7 days of the send date.
No external design spend – all graphics must be created using internal design assets.
Must use the approved EcoTech brand template; any deviation requires senior sign‑off.
Dependent on product release schedule – the Upcoming Feature Releases section can only include features that have been officially announced by the Product team by Wednesday.
Email size must stay under 100 KB to ensure deliverability.
workback_prompt: Create a detailed workback plan for the 'Weekly GreenPulse Customer Success Newsletter' at EcoTech Solutions. The plan should start from the send date (Friday, November 29, 2025, 09:00 AM PST) and work backwards, covering all tasks, owners, durations, dependencies, and milestones needed to meet the deadline and success criteria outlined in the scenario. Include steps for content drafting, stakeholder reviews, design asset creation, approval workflow, email build, testing, analytics setup, and post‑send reporting. Highlight any risk mitigation actions for the constraints (budget, compliance, and product‑release dependencies).
